content: this is my simple 3 row puffy christmas star pattern the star measures around 7 cm 2 3/4 inches tip to tip with 8ply/dk and about 9cm 3 1/2 inches with 10ply/aran yarn required using a 3 5mm hook and 8ply/dk 9 metres 10 yards for a 4 5mm hook and 10ply/aran about 11 metres 12 yards any size yarn and hook can be used great project to use up your scrap balls of yarn too please see my other all in one patterns
